original_text: As she was being brought out, she sent a message to her father-in-law. “I am pregnant by the man who owns these,” she said. And she added, “See if you recognize whose seal and cord and staff these are.”
korean_text: 여인이 끌려나갈 때에 사람을 보내어 시아버지에게 이르되 이 물건 임자로 말미암아 임신하였나이다 청하건대 보소서 이 도장과 그 끈과 지팡이가 누구의 것이니이까 한지라

sentences.original_text: As she was being brought out
she sent a message to her father-in-law
I am pregnant by the man who owns these
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이것들을 소유한 남자의 아이를 임신했습니다

sentences.original_text: whose seal and cord and staff these are
